answers.answer: i also have itchy genetalia and blurred vision

The tests for diabetes are so simple and inexpensive I don't know why he has not done them.Excessive urination is one symptom of diabetes, as is a "fruity" smell to the urine, which is produced by so-called ketone bodies.Blurred vision is another symptom.Out of control glucose levels often reflect themselves in a propensity for skin infection of various kinds.The hand cramps are likely because the excessive urination is dumping either potasium, calcium or magnesium. Try drinking two glasses of milk a day. Quinine sulfate capsules used to be available for hand cramping, but in the USA the FDA recently disapproved that use.There are various tests. A glucose fasting test is appropriate, as well as a test called the hba1c.
See an Endocrinologist ASAP!  You sound diabetic and need to start treatment right away.

question: hi , can someone try and help ...i have had severe thirst for about three months , i also urinate a lot , my urine smells strange , i cannot explain the smell , just different , my skin is itchy , i have right lower abdomen pain and pain in the bottom of my back and cramp in hands and legs and a nasty taste in my mouth , i have never been tested for diabetes , my dr thinks h.pylori , i dont , i think he,s just fobbing me off
title: i need diabetes info ...please
